feed.title: Mealie Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.6.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • A number of OIDC fixes
  • Quality of Life improvements for the shopping list and search

What's Changed

  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3484
  • fix: MultiPurposeLabel text color by @Kuchenpirat in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3485
  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.5.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3482
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3493
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to ^0.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3495
  • Fix OIDC infinite loop if user is not in OIDC_USER_GROUP by @cmintey in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3487
  • Add new OIDC TLS CA Certfile option by @cmintey in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3496
  • fix: Missing Translations by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3494
  • feat: Group Shopping List Items By Food by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3471
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3498
  • OIDC - Specifically check for 401 status before resetting by @cmintey in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3500
  • fix: Ratings UI and Filter Issues by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3459
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3501
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3507
  • fix(deps): update dependency fastapi to v0.110.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3497
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3510
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic to v2.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3513
  • chore(deps): update dependency coverage to v7.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3514
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3515
  • fix(deps): update dependency recipe-scrapers to v14.56.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3518
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3520
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3523
  • chore: Replace python-jose with PyJWT by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3521
  • chore: bump user agent by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3457
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3531
  • chore(deps): update dependency mypy to v1.10.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3516
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.20 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3517
  • fix(deps): update dependency fastapi to v0.110.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3532
  • fix(deps): update dependency tzdata to v2024 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3527
  • chore(deps): update dependency pytest to v8.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3522
  • fix: Security Issues by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3530
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3534
  • feat: Recipe Actions by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3448
  • fix(deps): update dependency orjson to v3.10.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3535
  • cleanup: parser localization by @Kuchenpirat in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3538
  • docs: Formatting by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3539
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.2 by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3533
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3542
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3548
  • fix(deps): update dependency fastapi to ^0.111.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3549
  • fix(deps): update dependency rapidfuzz to v3.9.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3550
  • Make OIDC groups claim configurable and optional by @cmintey in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3552
  • fix(deps): update dependency orjson to v3.10.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3553
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.21 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3555
  • chore(deps): update dependency coverage to v7.5.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3563
  • fix(deps): update dependency bcrypt to v4.1.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3560
  • fix: Shopping list labels reordering dialog by @p0lycarpio in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3540
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3565
  • fix: Make Nextcloud Migrations Fault Tolerant by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3544
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.3 by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3564
  • New Crowdin updates by @hay-kot in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3569
  • fix(deps): update dependency jinja2 to v3.1.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3570
  • fix(deps): update dependency sqlalchemy to v2.0.30 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3568
  • fix: Recipe Search Quirks and Session Storage by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3541

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/compare/v1.5.1...v1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.7.0 - AI, of course!
entry.content:
Highlights

You can now use OpenAI to parse recipe ingredients! Details on the PR and in the docs. It looks more reliable than the existing methods, but it will come at a small cost for your OpenAI API key.

What's Changed

  • feat: Default To Fractions When Unit Is Empty by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3587
  • feat: OpenAI Ingredient Parsing by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3581
  • feat: Data Management from Shopping List by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3603
  • fix: Add time-based caching for JWKS fetching by @cmintey in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3586
  • fix: NLP Ingredient Parser Misses Some Fractions by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3618
  • fix: Broken Import by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3630
  • fix: Fix file not found error with individual recipe export/download. by @nephlm in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3579
  • fix: Fixed comment describing method by @ZacWarham in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3611
  • chore: Remove Server Tasks by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3592
  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.6.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3571
  • fix(deps): update dependency rapidfuzz to v3.9.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3623
  • fix(deps): update dependency requests to v2.32.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3631
  • fix(deps): update dependency apprise to v1.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3588
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.30.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3633
  • fix(deps): update dependency requests to v2.32.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3632
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3577
  • chore(deps): update dependency pre-commit to v3.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3583
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.22 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3589
  • chore(deps): update dependency pylint to v3.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3595
  • chore(deps): update dependency pylint to v3.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3598
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.23 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3605
  • chore(deps): update dependency pylint to v3.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3616
  • chore(deps): update dependency pytest-asyncio to v0.23.7 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3620
  • chore(deps): update dependency pytest to v8.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3621
  • chore(deps): update dependency pylint to v3.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3625
  • chore(deps): update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.5.24 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3629
  • New Crowdin updates (Total: 10)

New Contributors

  • @ZacWarham made their first contribution in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3611
  • @nephlm made their first contribution in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3579

Full Changelog: https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/compare/v1.6.0...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.8.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • You can now set the default number of days to appear when you load the meal planner; configure it via the calendar/date picker on the meal planner screen.
  • New migration option supported, Recipe Keeper

What's Changed

  • feat: Setting backend passwords with docker compose secrets by @aljora in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3656
  • feat: Set default number of days on meal planner by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3650
  • feat: Add recipekeeper migration by @derpferd in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3642
  • feat: Update Shopping List Timestamp on List Item Update by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3453
  • feat: Handle Safari-mangled backup ZIPs and improve backup UI by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3674
  • feat: Ensure PR title fits convention by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3683
  • fix: Set the daily schedule to a specific time, rather than 24hr from start up by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3645
  • fix: Broken Data Management Tabs by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3680
  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.7.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3637
  • docs: Update documentation link on main readme by @DataDalton in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3657
  • docs: add possible log levels by @DennisGaida in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3638
  • docs: Add Key Features to README by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3678
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.30.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3640
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.30.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3646

  • fix(deps): update dependency requests to v2.32.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3668

  • fix(deps): update dependency uvicorn to v0.30.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3685
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.31.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3691

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.9.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Lots of new contributors, thanks!!! 😍 🚀
  • OpenAI as an option for recipe scraping, https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3690
  • Migrations are more fault tolerant to Safari-caused zip issues, https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3712

What's Changed

  • feat: Open AI Recipe Scraper by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3690
  • feat: Added images to PWA shortcuts by @Choromanski in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3744
  • feat: Show nutrition on recipe print by @Asdoos in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3740
  • fix: Recipe Keeper Errors and Other Safari Issues by @michael-genson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3712
  • fix: Make fractions in the ingredient list look a tiny bit nicer by @bartkummel in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3725
  • docs(auto): Update image tag, for release v1.8.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3698
  • docs: Add doco for db changes by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3721
  • docs: Add n8n backup automation example guide by @Greirson in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3648
  • docs: Adjust badges in README by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3728
  • docs: Fix typo in python logging docs by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3736
  • docs: Provide meaningful URLs for some badges by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3742
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.31.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3700
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic-settings to v2.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3701

  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic-settings to v2.3.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3723
  • fix(deps): update dependency orjson to v3.10.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3722
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic to v2.7.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3729
  • fix(deps): update dependency openai to v1.34.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3730
  • fix(deps): update dependency pydantic-settings to v2.3.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3733
  • fix(deps): update dependency orjson to v3.10.5 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3734
  • chore(deps): update dependency ruff to v0.4.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3699

entry.title: New release for Mealie: v1.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Revert "fix: Offline Shopping List Fixes" by @boc-the-git in https://github.com/mealie-recipes/mealie/pull/3835
